extendedInfo.description: Ever wonder how many calories or carbohydrates are in your favorite alcoholic beverages? Curious what drinks won't erase gains from hard workouts?Not anymore! With DrinkFit, the power is now at your fingertips!DrinkFit offers detailed nutritional information for Beer, Cocktails, Liquor, Wine, Wine Coolers, and Mixers!1600+ Drinks listed. Learning to become a bartender? Discover nutrition facts for your specialty drinks & recipes!

reviews.comment: Wouldn\'t download on my backflip and now wont give me a refund very bad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice start. But, limited listing of drinks without ability to add your own drinks/caloric info and unable to add notes to say why you liked/disliked.
reviews.author: A Google User
